statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses_images WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT image_url FROM survey_responses_images WHERE response_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT response_id FROM survey_responses_images ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, image_url FROM survey_responses_images WHERE response_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM survey_responses_images;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses_images WHERE image_id = 1 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses_images GROUP BY image_id, survey_id HAVING total_responses > 5;
SELECT image_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM survey_responses_images GROUP BY image_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, MAX(upload_date) AS latest_upload FROM survey_responses_images GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM survey_responses_images GROUP BY survey_id HAVING unique_users >= 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 5;
SELECT image_url FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM SurveyImages WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, image_url, image_description FROM SurveyImages WHERE survey_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_id, response_time FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses, survey_id FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM SurveyImages WHERE survey_id = 3 AND image_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyImages ON SurveyResponses.survey_id = SurveyImages.survey_id ORDER BY SurveyResponses.response_time ASC, SurveyImages.image_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, image_url FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, uploaded_at, image_id FROM survey_images WHERE uploaded_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT image_id, survey_id FROM survey_images WHERE survey_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, response_date, image_url FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple_choice';
SELECT * FROM survey_images WHERE uploaded_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT question_text, survey_id FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM respondents WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, survey_id FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT respondent_id, first_name, last_name FROM respondents ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT survey_id, question_text FROM survey_questions WHERE LENGTH(question_text) > 50;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id;

SELECT respondents.first_name, respondents.last_name, survey_responses.image_url FROM respondents INNER JOIN survey_responses ON respondents.respondent_id = survey_responses.response_id ORDER BY respondents.last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 5
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY response_id DESC
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_image_url FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 3 ORDER BY respondent_name ASC
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice' AND survey_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY survey_id, response_id;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) as total_responses FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, response_text, response_image_url FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_image_url IS NOT NULL AND response_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY RAND();
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY respondent_name ASC, response_id DESC LIMIT 5;
